docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan. 4 (UP)--A Three-man court of honor ruled today there were no grounds for a duel between President Luis Batlle Berres and Opposition Congressman Washington Guadalupe.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan. 4 (UP)--A Three-man court of honor ruled today there were no grounds for a duel between President Luis Batlle Berres and Opposition Congressman Washington Guadalupe.

headline.main: DUEL HELD GROUNDLESS; Uruguay Court Bars Meeting of President and Foe

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay-- Official statistics show that the cost-of-living index in Uruguay, as of last October, climbed to 262.50 from a basic level of 100 for 1943.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay-- Official statistics show that the cost-of-living index in Uruguay, as of last October, climbed to 262.50 from a basic level of 100 for 1943.
docs.abstract: cost-of-living index up to 262.5, Oct, from basic 100 in '43

headline.main: URUGUAY COSTS CLIMB; Index at 262.50 Compared With Basic 100 for 1943

byline.original: Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Jan. 6--It looked today as if the Philippines had won out as the site of a research center in peaceful uses of atomic energy.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 6--It looked today as if the Philippines had won out as the site of a research center in peaceful uses of atomic energy.
docs.abstract: 24 nations have pacts with US for aid in peaceful research, materials, reactor bldg

headline.main: PHILIPPINES DUE TO BE ATOM SITE; Appears Sure to Be Selected by United States as the Research Center in Asia Japan Favored by Many India Gets Atomic Library

byline.original: By DANA ADAMS SCHMIDT Special to The New York Times.Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: The appointment of Burke G. Piper, a former assistant director of audits for the General Accounting Office, as treasurer of the Grace Line was announced yesterday.
docs.lead_paragraph: The appointment of Burke G. Piper, a former assistant director of audits for the General Accounting Office, as treasurer of the Grace Line was announced yesterday.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Jan. 12 (UP) --Counsel for the nation's major airlines asked the United States Appeals Court today to stop the nonscheduled carriers from initiating their newly authorized expanded flight plan until it could be tested in court.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 12 (UP) --Counsel for the nation's major airlines asked the United States Appeals Court today to stop the nonscheduled carriers from initiating their newly authorized expanded flight plan until it could be tested in court.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Jan. 13-- Lewis L. Strauss, chairman of the Atomic Energy Commission, reported to President Eisenhower today that good progress was being made on the President's atoms-for-peace program.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 13-- Lewis L. Strauss, chairman of the Atomic Energy Commission, reported to President Eisenhower today that good progress was being made on the President's atoms-for-peace program.

headline.main: ATOMS FOR PEACE REPORTED GAINING; Strauss Informs Eisenhower of Progress on Program to Aid the World Warns on Disarmament

docs.snippet: Douglas Ford of Yonkers, N.Y., and Fay Crocker of Uruguay will be honored at the Metropolitan Golf Writers' Association's annual dinner, Jan. 26, at the Plaza Hotel, it was revealed yesterday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Douglas Ford of Yonkers, N.Y., and Fay Crocker of Uruguay will be honored at the Metropolitan Golf Writers' Association's annual dinner, Jan. 26, at the Plaza Hotel, it was revealed yesterday.

headline.main: Golf Writers to Honor Fay Crocker and Ford

docs.snippet: SEA ISLAND Ga., Jan. 14 (AP) --Mrs. Kathy McKinnon Cornelius of Lake Worth, Fla., playing her first competitive round since last February, carded a 72 today to take a four-stroke lead at the halfway point in the Sea Island women's invitation golf...
docs.lead_paragraph: SEA ISLAND Ga., Jan. 14 (AP) --Mrs. Kathy McKinnon Cornelius of Lake Worth, Fla., playing her first competitive round since last February, carded a 72 today to take a four-stroke lead at the halfway point in the Sea Island women's invitation golf tournament.

headline.main: LINKS LEAD GOES TO MRS. CORNELIUS; Floridian Gains 4-Shot Edge With 72 at Sea Island-- Three Tie for Second THE LEADING SCORES
